experience.title: Face Mask Detector for Covid-19
experience.description: â€¢Used transfer learning to develop a human face mask detector for images/real-time video streams & achieved an accuracy of 95%â€¢Developed CNN model with MobileNet V2 architecture as base model integrating with 2 FC layers and trained it using the open datasetâ€¢Used face recognition library to detect all the faces present and pre-trained model is utilized to classify each faces as with or without mask

experience.title: Hall President
experience.description: â€¢ Elected by 390 boarders of the hall to voice their concerns and to represent their interest to the Institute's administrationâ€¢ Partnered with cab aggregators to provide improved conveyance to the final year students of MS Hall by initiating a shuttle service.â€¢ Responsible for functioning of the Hall and Discharge of all Hall activities and managing a total budget of 11+ Lakh rupeesâ€¢ Leading a team of 7 General Secretaries and 18 Secretaries to ensure active participation across various General Championship eventsâ€¢ Accumulated INR 5+ Lakh from the Alumni to assist 50+ hall workers in the COVID 19 pandemic to provide them basic amenities

experience.title: Machine learning techniques for health monitoring of structures
experience.description: This project was part of my BTP workâ€¢ To train a neural network to recognize the behavior of undamaged structure as well as of structure with various possible damaged statesâ€¢ When the trained network is subjected to the measured response, it should be able to detect any existing damage in the structure
